name: SKAdTestSession
desc: The class you use to test ad impressions and postbacks in Xcode.

items.name: func validate(SKAdImpression, publicKey: String)
items.desc: Validates an impression for a view-through ad.

items.name: func validateImpression(parameters: [String : Any], publicKey: String)
items.desc: Validates an impression for a StoreKit-rendered ad.

items.name: func setPostbacks([SKAdTestPostback])
items.desc: Add test postbacks to the test session.

items.name: var postbacks: [SKAdTestPostback]
items.desc: An array of test postbacks you set in the testing environment.

items.name: func flushPostbacks(responses: SKANTestPostbackResponseHandler)
items.desc: Sends the test postbacks and handles the responses.

items.name: typealias SKANTestPostbackResponseHandler
items.desc: A type that represents the test postback response handler.
